channel.title: Startups on JW Caterine
channel.description: Recent content in Startups on JW Caterine

item.title: Virginia Business August Issue
item.description:
I have four stories in the August Issue of Virginia Business: one on Richmond’s repeal of minimum parking requirements, one on a couple of Virginia startup incubators competing for a SBA grant, one on a new tuition-assistance program at MBU, and one about the city of Bristol’s switch to a new destination marketing organization in Southwest Virginia.

This is the first time I’ve published my work in a magazine - happy to put another notch on my journalism belt! I’m currently working for other new publications as well. Stay tuned!
